short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI tool which is will help you solving mcq questions with gemini

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help you to solve mcq questions without making you leave the webpage. You just have to select the question and then right click . then click on ask ai and it will send a notification with the answer. Make sure your notifications is open
